title: Pizza O'Possum's/The Curse of Half-Beard's Booty
description: Pizza O'Possum's: Shaggy drags the gang to a childhood arcade where he's determined to finally collect enough tickets to win the prize he's wanted since he was a boy. Unfortunately, the animatronic mascot of the place has apparently come to life and has other ideas./The Curse of Half-Beard's Booty: At a seafood restaurant, the gang comes across Captain Cutler, who Fred is determined to catch once and for all. Cutler explains that he's turned over a new leaf and opened up this restaurant to earn an honest living. Unfortunately, the ghost of a legendary pirate, Half-Beard, has been scaring away his customers. Fred and Cutler form an uneasy alliance as he joins the gang on a treasure hunt at Double-Cross Cove where Half-Beard's treasure is supposedly buried.
